entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023
